title: 开启光影MOD SEUE RC6提示Error：invalid program composite
author: 铃原泉水子
txt_content:
本帖最后由 铃原泉水子 于 2013-9-23 14:23 编辑 

以前Win7旗舰没事 有次不小心动了注册表重做了系统 换了Win7专业版 是某种插件没装还是系统本身有问题呢？顺带一提RC7和大部分也没事 好像有一种MOD是直接白屏

replies.author: mot321
replies.txt_content:
RC6應該沒事的,
正式版V10.0出現Error：invalid program composite
官方也回應了,For those of you testing out my Volumetric Clouds archives and getting brightly colored artifacts and are using an nvidia graphics card, download these drivers. They have already fixed the problem for a few people. I guess the newer drivers are bugged.
N卡的問題,請使用306.97 WHQL驅動程式
http://www.nvidia.com/object/win ... 97-whql-driver.html

replies.author: 铃原泉水子
replies.txt_content:
mot321 发表于 2013-9-28 12:16 
RC6應該沒事的,
正式版V10.0出現Error：invalid program composite
官方也回應了,
等等赶紧试试 非常感谢 好像还有灯材质崩掉的问题
